values: 点；磅值；时刻；位置；地方；地点；立场；观点；要点；论点；细节；细目；条款；分数；得分；目的；意图；见解；理由；道岔；轨尖；尖端；顶点；标点符号；特点；特色；关键；核心问题
指；指出；提出（意见）；指路；指向；朝向；强调；着重说明；瞄准；画点；加标点；对准；对着；定位；指引方向

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 无意义的；钝的；不尖的；不得要领的
尖的；突出的；锐利的；率直的
不相干地；漫无目标地；不得要领地（pointless的副词形式）

word_group.brief_definition: 观点, 看法, 态度；观察点, 叙事角度, 观察位置
在某些点；某些时刻；在某个地方
主要观点；要点；主要切入点
商品吸引顾客之处；卖点

bilingual.source: The Mogao Caves have long been a meeting point for different cultures.
bilingual.target: 莫高窟长期以来一直是不同文化的交汇点。

bilingual.source: Nonpoint pollution is harder to manage than point source pollution.
bilingual.target: 非点源污染比点源污染更难管理。

bilingual.source: The river is widest at this point.
bilingual.target: 这条河在这个点是最宽的。
每个项目都有一个出发点。

bilingual.source: This is the starting point of our trip.
bilingual.target: 这是我们旅行的出发点。

bilingual.source: We need to find a new starting point.
bilingual.target: 我们需要找到一个新的出发点。
你能把你的意思说得更清晰一点吗？

list.abstract: point，意思是尖端、尖头；时刻、瞬间的意思。
POINT品牌是深圳市欢享乐途高新科技发展有限公司 在1993年5月成立时向国家商标申请的。POINT品牌取自是为了纪念德国医生恩斯梯.格拉齐拍发现了那个隐蔽的深藏在女人身体中的点！使得男女之间更容易达到理想的欢愉状态。

yingyinNormal.en: Baron von De-Struck? Oh, just get to the point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 冯·迪斯特拉克男爵？直接说重点。

yingyinNormal.en: It's a flower, Vika. Yeah, that's not the point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 它只是一朵花，维卡。是的，重点不是这个。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm making a point. You brought this on yourself.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我只是阐明一个观点，你是自作自受。

yingyinNormal.en: Yeah, what's your point? Well, the stuff I just mentioned.
yingyinNormal.zh: 是啊，你的重点是什么？我刚才说的就是啊。

yingyinNormal.en: 15's the point, the point is 15. Give the little lady some room here, it is coming out.
yingyinNormal.zh: 目标15点，就要15点以上，给老娘让点儿地方，准备上啦。

yingyinNormal.en: So you were not being paid under his all-service contract at that point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 也就是说，根据全面服务合同，这个时间点你并没有获得报酬，对吗？

yingyinNormal.en: That is my spot. In an ever-changing world, it is a single point of consistency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 那是我的专座，在这个不断变化的世界里，这是不变的一点。

yingyinNormal.en: It wouldn't be the worst thing if we were more active. Oh. You make an excellent point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们多运动一点也不是什么坏事啊，兄台此言甚是有理。

yingyinNormal.en: Wait. Are you saying that I'm... Rowby. It's a negotiating point. No, it's not, actually.
yingyinNormal.zh: 等等，你是说我... 罗比，这一点还需再谈判。其实无需谈判了。

yingyinNormal.en: I saw something on the Bill Moyers show, recently, that so reminded me of this point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 最近，我在比尔莫耶斯访谈节目中看到的一些事情，使我更加明确了这一点。

yingyinNormal.en: But there's no point in dwelling on that on his birthday. Thank God he's not good-looking. Ah, stop!
yingyinNormal.zh: 但没必要在他的生日上纠结这一点，幸好他长得不帅。住手！

yingyinNormal.en: And what they find is a single-point mutation in a gene responsible for controlling programmed cell death.
yingyinNormal.zh: 然后他们在控制程序性细胞死亡的基因上发现一个单点突变。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the news. And that was a woman torn between two hunky vampires. What is your point?
yingyinNormal.zh: 这可是新闻啊。那剧是在说一个女人为两个帅壮吸血鬼左右为难。你的点是什么？

yingyinNormal.en: This might be the lowest point of my life, and my mom once lost me in a craps game behind a casino.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这应该是我人生最低点，我老妈还曾把我留在一家赌场的双骰儿赌位上。

yingyinNormal.en: Man's got a point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 男人是有重点的。

yingyinNormal.en: Relax a few days on Mauna Kea Beach, with Hawaii's highest point, the summit of the Mauna Kea volcano, in the backdrop.
yingyinNormal.zh: 身处莫纳克亚海滩，以夏威夷的最高点，莫纳克亚火山做背景，好好放松几天。

yingyinNormal.en: No, I'm not trying to ruin your lives. It's just that your GPAs are tied to the thousandth of a decimal point.
yingyinNormal.zh: 不，我不是要毁掉你们的人生，只是因为你们俩的绩点持平，小数点后一千位也是一样的。

yingyinNormal.en: So, how you been? Well, my existence is a continuum, so I've been what I am at each point in the implied time period.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你最近怎样？我的存在是个连续统一体，所以在指定期间的每个时间点都是一样的。

yingyinNormal.en: There is no threshold that makes us greater than the sum of our parts, no inflection point at which we become fully alive.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们不过是一堆血肉组成，并没有升华的"质变点"，不会是有生命到无生命的区别。

yingyinNormal.en: I like cows. That's not the point. It was its own point. Go on.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我喜欢牛。这不是重点。你怎么想不重要，继续说吧。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观点; 论点; 见解
细节; 方面; 特征
点状物; 句号; 小数点
尖头; 尖端; 削尖

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无意义的；无用的；无目的的；无得分的
adj. 尖的；尖头的；锥形头的；尖锐的；不含糊的

word_family.mean: n. 尖；尖头；尖端；标点；点；处；地方；位置；条；项；分；岬角；轨尖；道岔；防守位置；接触点；尖兵队；外部位；直窜位置；束衣带；束帆绳；狗指方向的动作或姿势；重要乐句；重要主题

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 观点；看法；态度；观察点；叙事角度；观察位置
商品吸引顾客之处；卖点

examination_example.sentence: You want to predict if something needs attention now and <highlight>point</highlight> to where it's useful for employees to go to.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你想要预测现在是否需要关注某件事，并指出哪些地方对员工有用。

examination_example.sentence: Optimists <highlight>point</highlight> out that technological upheaval has benefited workers in the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乐观主义者指出，在过去技术变革曾让工人受益。

examination_example.sentence: Julie Parks of Grand Rapids Community College <highlight>points</highlight> to another key to luring Millennials into manufacturing: a work/life balance.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大急流社区学院的Julie Parks指出了吸引千禧一代进入制造业的另一个关键:工作与生活的平衡。

sense_info_list.en: (一般作the point) the significant or essential element of what is intended or being discussed

examination_example.sentence: But this distinction misses the <highlight>point</highlight> that it is processing and aggregation, not the mere possession of bits, that gives the data value.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是这种区别忽略了一点，即赋予数据价值的是处理和聚合，而不仅仅是位的占有。

examination_example.sentence: Brynjolfsson and McAfee indeed touched on this <highlight>point</highlight> in their book.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Brynjolfsson和McAfee确实在他们的书中谈到了这一点。

examination_example.sentence: But had Entergy kept its word, that debate would be beside the <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 不过，如果安特吉能源（公司）信守自己的承诺，这场争论就不重要了。

sense_info_list.en: a particular moment in time or stage in a process

examination_example.sentence: While the statement is vague, it represents one starting <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 虽然这个声明很模糊，但它代表了一个起点。

examination_example.sentence: At any given <highlight>point</highlight>, I should have deep work scheduled for roughly the next month.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 任何时刻，我都应该将此后大概一个月中的深度工作都规划好。

examination_example.sentence: Happiness is not a <highlight>point</highlight> of future and not a moment from the past.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 幸福不是未来的一个时刻，也不是过去的一瞬间。

sense_info_list.en: a mark or unit of scoring

examination_example.sentence: A standardised exam which is marked out of 800 <highlight>points</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 满分800分的标准化考试。

examination_example.sentence: A candidate would need 30 more GMAT <highlight>points</highlight> than would otherwise have been necessary.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 申请者就要在GMAT中多考出本来不需要多的 30 分。

examination_example.sentence: The score for the next applicant would drop by an average of 0.075 <highlight>points</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 下一位申请者的分数将平均下降0.075分。

sense_info_list.en: an argument or idea
sense_info_list.zh: 观点; 论点; 见解

examination_example.sentence: In the UK, it has become a big talking <highlight>point</highlight> recently too, for a rather particular reason: Brexit.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在英国，它最近也成为了一个热门论点，原因相当特别：英国脱欧。

examination_example.sentence: Remind the person that this is your <highlight>point</highlight> of view, and then invite critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒对方这是你的观点，然后邀请对方批评。

examination_example.sentence: That might seem rather an obscure <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这似乎是一个相当模糊的观点。

examination_example.sentence: Several important <highlight>points</highlight> in the image are registered like a series of snapshots.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 图像中的几个重要点像一系列快照一样被记录下来。

examination_example.sentence: They often include a certain amount of digging to test for buried materials at selected <highlight>points</highlight> across a landscape.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它们通常包括一定量的挖掘，以测试景观中选定点的掩埋材料。

examination_example.sentence: Objective knowledge is the goal, not the starting <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 客观知识是目标，而不是起点。

sense_info_list.en: advantage or purpose that can be gained from doing something

examination_example.sentence: This is not to say that there is no <highlight>point</highlight> in getting a degree, but rather stress that a degree is not for everyone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这并不是说获得学位没有意义，而是强调学位并不适合所有人。

examination_example.sentence: It depends on a mistaken view of arguments that in many ways misses the <highlight>point</highlight> of arguing in the first place.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这取决于对争论的错误的观点，而这种观点在很多方面一开始就忽略了争论的意义。

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>point</highlight> of a style upgrade isn't to become more vain or to spend more time fussing over what to wear.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 时尚升级的目的不是为了变得更加虚荣，也不是为了花更多时间在穿什么衣服上。

examination_example.sentence: A pair of bills provide a case in <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 两项法案提供了一个恰当的例子。

sense_info_list.en: show the position or direction of something especially by extending a finger in a particular direction
(of a situation) be evidence or an indication that (something) is likely to happen or be the case
give force or emphasis to words or actions

sense_info_list.zh: 细节; 方面; 特征
点状物; 句号; 小数点

sense_info_list.en: the tapered, sharp end of a tool, weapon, or other object
sense_info_list.zh: 尖头; 尖端; 削尖

圆点; 点状物; 句号
尖头; 尖端; 尖状物; 削尖

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 观点；看法；态度；观察点；叙事角度；观察位置

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无意义的；无用的；无目的的；无得分的
n. 对位法；形成对比的论点；复调；对立声部

word_family.mean: n. 尖；尖头；尖端；标点；点；处；地方；位置；条；项；分；岬角；轨尖；道岔；防守位置；接触点；尖兵队；外部位；直窜位置；束衣带；束帆绳；狗指方向的动作或姿势；重要乐句；重要主题

sense_info_list.en: a particular moment in time or stage in a process

examination_example.sentence: Issues often get ignored there until they build up and reach a crisis <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 问题往往在那里被忽视，直到它们积累起来并达到关键点。

examination_example.sentence: Most of us have spent some time drawing before, but at some <highlight>point</highlight>, most of us stop drawing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们大多数人以前都花过一些时间画画，但在某个时候，我们大多数人都停止了画画。

examination_example.sentence: Usually a farmer will get to the <highlight>point</highlight> where financially, what they redoing is not working.That's when they call Maple Hill.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 通常，农民在经济上会陷入他们所在做的事情并不起效的处境。那就是他们联系 Maple Hill 的时候。

sense_info_list.en: an argument or idea put forward by a person in discussion

examination_example.sentence: That's a good <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是一个很好的观点。

examination_example.sentence: A <highlight>point</highlight> worth making is that the study was based only on the perspective of employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 值得一提的是，该研究仅基于员工的视角。

examination_example.sentence: It was conducted from frontline managers' <highlight>point</highlight> of view.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它是从一线经理的角度进行的。

sense_info_list.en: the chief idea or meaning
sense_info_list.zh: 主旨; 目的; 针对

examination_example.sentence: Here's a crucial <highlight>point</highlight> most people miss.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是大多数人都会忽略的一个关键点。

examination_example.sentence: They make it a <highlight>point</highlight> to be on good terms with their employees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们强调要与员工保持良好关系。

sense_info_list.en: show the position or direction of something especially by extending a finger in a particular direction

sense_info_list.zh: 圆点; 点状物; 句号

sense_info_list.en: (of a situation) be evidence or an indication that (something) is likely to happen or be the case
advantage or purpose that can be gained from doing something

examination_example.sentence: The <highlight>point</highlight> to win the diseases of childhood were eliminated, but this did not provide any insight into childhood development.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 战胜儿童疾病的意义被消除了，但这并没有提供任何关于儿童发展的见解。

examination_example.sentence: Advanced batteries are moving out of specialized markets and creeping into the mainstream, signaling a tipping <highlight>point</highlight> for forward-looking technologies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高能电池正逐步退出专业化市场，潜入主流市场中，这标志着前瞻性技术的到来。

sense_info_list.en: a mark or unit of scoring

examination_example.sentence: The IQ of the children in the two musical groups rose by an average of seven <highlight>points</highlight> in the course of a year.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在一年的时间里，这两个音乐团的孩子们的智商平均提高了7分。

sense_info_list.en: give force or emphasis to words or actions

examination_example.sentence: In the 1930s, prices crashed, to the <highlight>point</highlight> that, in some parts of the country, oil was cheaper than water.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 20世纪30年代，价格暴跌，以至于在该国的一些地方，石油比水还便宜。

sense_info_list.en: the tapered, sharp end of a tool, weapon, or other object
sense_info_list.zh: 尖头; 尖端; 尖状物; 削尖

word_usage.usage: point既可作及物动词，也可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，后接名词或代词作宾语；作不及物动词时，常与介词to, at, towards等连用，表示“指向某位置或方向”或“表明”。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 主旨; 目的; 针对
圆点; 点状物; 句号

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 观点；看法；态度；观察点；叙事角度；观察位置
在某些点；某些时刻；在某个地方
平均绩点；平均成绩；平均分
强项；支撑点；有力的论点

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 无意义的；无用的；无目的的；无得分的

word_family.mean: n. 尖；尖头；尖端；标点；点；处；地方；位置；条；项；分；岬角；轨尖；道岔；防守位置；接触点；尖兵队；外部位；直窜位置；束衣带；束帆绳；狗指方向的动作或姿势；重要乐句；重要主题

sense_info_list.en: a particular moment in time or stage in a process

examination_example.sentence: "Loneliness touches almost every one of us at some <highlight>point</highlight>," its minister for loneliness Baroness Barran said.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “孤独感几乎会在某个阶段影响到每个人，”该组织负责孤独感的部长巴伦男爵夫人说。

examination_example.sentence: That means that everyone will, at some <highlight>point</highlight> in their life, have to make a number of major reinvestment in their skills.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这意味着每个人在人生的某个节点，都必须做出许多重大的技能再投资。

examination_example.sentence: After a <highlight>point</highlight>, countries can become so dangerous that food relief workers are no longer safe and their programs are halted.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 过了一段时间，国家可能会变得如此危险，以至于食品救济人员不再安全，并且他们的计划也停止了。

sense_info_list.en: an argument or idea put forward by a person in discussion

examination_example.sentence: "Having a strong <highlight>point</highlight> of view, signature style, or being a super-enthusiast in a particular field makes someone interesting," she says.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 她说：“拥有强烈的观点、标志性的风格，或者是某个特定领域的超级爱好者，会让一个人变得有趣。”。

examination_example.sentence: You might have a <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的论点有道理。

examination_example.sentence: To illustrate her <highlight>point</highlight> that beauty is but skin deep.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 为了阐明她的观点，美丽只是肤浅的。

sense_info_list.en: give force or emphasis to words or actions

examination_example.sentence: Studies <highlight>point</highlight> to how boredom is good for creativity and innovation, as well as mental health.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 研究表明，无聊对创造力和创新以及心理健康都有好处。

examination_example.sentence: A commentary in the Shanghai Daily <highlight>points</highlight> out that innovation doesn't mean piles of documents.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《上海日报》的一篇评论指出，创新并不意味着成堆的文件。

sense_info_list.en: a mark or unit of scoring

examination_example.sentence: Scott agrees to try more fruit juices for the kids and to make real macaroni and cheese. Score one <highlight>point</highlight> for the doctor, zero for diabetes.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 斯科特同意为孩子们尝试更多的果汁，并做真正的通心粉和奶酪。医生得一分，糖尿病的几率就为零。

examination_example.sentence: Graduation requirements specify the number of credits you must earn and the minimum grade <highlight>point</highlight> average you must achieve.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 毕业要求规定了你必须获得的学分数和你必须达到的最低平均绩点。

examination_example.sentence: It offers various courses with credit <highlight>points</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它提供有学分的各种课程。

sense_info_list.en: hold something out in the direction of someone or something

examination_example.sentence: In fact, the way chores work in many households worldwide <highlight>points</highlight> to another way.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，世界各地许多家庭的家务工作方式指向另一种方式。

examination_example.sentence: The combined effects of those trends and the political tensions they generate <highlight>point</highlight> to the breakdown of governments and societies.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这些趋势的综合影响以及它们所造成的紧张政治局势指向政府和社会的崩溃。

sense_info_list.en: advantage or purpose that can be gained from doing something

examination_example.sentence: There is no <highlight>point</highlight> in transferring office work to working from home.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 把办公室工作转移到在家工作是没有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: There is no <highlight>point</highlight> saying you run marathons if you will be out of breath arriving at the interview on the second floor.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你在二楼到达面试地点时都要上气不接下气，那么说你跑马拉松是没有意义的。

examination_example.sentence: What's the <highlight>point</highlight> of producing an engine like that?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 制造这样的引擎有什么意义呢？

sense_info_list.en: show the position or direction of something especially by extending a finger in a particular direction

examination_example.sentence: "Rely on health experts who've reviewed all the evidence," Liebman says, <highlight>pointing</highlight> to the official government Dietary Guidelines.
examination_example.sentence_trans: “依靠已经审查了所有证据的健康专家，”利伯曼指着官方的政府膳食指南说。

sense_info_list.en: the chief idea or meaning
sense_info_list.zh: 主旨; 目的; 针对

sense_info_list.en: a distinctive feature or characteristic; typically a good one; of a person or thing

examination_example.sentence: Recycling is not one of the country's strong <highlight>points</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 回收利用并不是这个国家的强项。

sense_info_list.zh: 圆点; 点状物; 句号

word_usage.usage: point既可作及物动词，也可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，后接名词或代词作宾语；作不及物动词时，常与介词to, at, towards等连用，表示“指向某位置或方向”或“表明”。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 指针；猎犬；提示；链接；教鞭；指示棒；暗示；线索；点子；建议

word_family.mean: n. 尖；尖头；尖端；标点；点；处；地方；位置；条；项；分；岬角；轨尖；道岔；防守位置；接触点；尖兵队；外部位；直窜位置；束衣带；束帆绳；狗指方向的动作或姿势；重要乐句；重要主题

examination_example.sentence: According to Paragraph 3, what marked the turning <highlight>point</highlight> in the author's growth?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 根据第3段，作者成长的转折点是什么？

examination_example.sentence: They focus on them to the <highlight>point</highlight> of exhaustion, and at the risk of the ridicule of their peers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会把注意力集中到筋疲力尽的地步，冒着被同伴嘲笑的风险。

examination_example.sentence: And what was the turning <highlight>point</highlight> in your life that made you an artist?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 让你成为艺术家的人生转折点是什么？

examination_example.sentence: This bit of success, however, was the <highlight>point</highlight> where my problem began.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，这一点成功，却是我的问题开始的地方。

examination_example.sentence: Walking up a path through the forest towards Shutlingsloe, a local high <highlight>point</highlight>, I came across a small clearing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 沿着一条穿过森林的小路向当地的高地Shutlingsloe走去，我无意间来到了一块小空地。

examination_example.sentence: Chinese customs began NAT (核酸检测) on inbound arrivals at all <highlight>points</highlight> of entry.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 中国海关开始对入境移民的所有入口点进行NAT（核酸检测）。

examination_example.sentence: At this <highlight>point</highlight>, it is not clear why dogs seem to be equipped with the ability to recognize different facial expressions in humans.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在这一点上，还不清楚为什么狗似乎具备了识别人类不同面部表情的能力。

examination_example.sentence: Make a <highlight>point</highlight>, and make it safe for others to do the same.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 表达自己的观点，让其他人也能安全地做同样的事。

examination_example.sentence: You must keep these <highlight>points</highlight> in mind while setting your goals.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在设定目标时，你必须牢记这些要点。

examination_example.sentence: It's not just corporate jobs, or even paid work that can help keep your brain fit, Then <highlight>points</highlight> out.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他指出，不仅是公司的工作，甚至是有偿的工作，都能帮助你保持大脑健康。

examination_example.sentence: It is not my intention to <highlight>point</highlight> out the central theme of each of the plays in this collection.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我并不打算指出这个选集中每一部戏剧的中心主题。

examination_example.sentence: To <highlight>point</highlight> out the importance of public libraries.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 指出公共图书馆的重要性。

examination_example.sentence: After a short way, the farmer stopped and <highlight>pointed</highlight> at a weed which we missed.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 走了一小段路后，农夫停下脚步，指着我们错过的一片杂草。

examination_example.sentence: He pulls out a special device, <highlight>points</highlight> it at the suspect, and switches it on.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他拿出一个特殊的装置，对准嫌疑人，打开开关。

examination_example.sentence: Simply turn the machine or <highlight>point</highlight> it at the target, and your peace and quiet comes back.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只要转动机器或对准目标，你就会恢复平静。

examination_example.sentence: Emotional intelligence, with its focus on both head and heart, may serve to <highlight>point</highlight> us in the right direction.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 情商既关注头脑，也关注内心，可能会为我们指明正确的方向。

examination_example.sentence: My parents made it a <highlight>point</highlight> for their two kids to spend time outside, no matter the weather or season.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我的父母让他们的两个孩子无论天气或季节，都要花时间在户外。

examination_example.sentence: I then made it a <highlight>point</highlight> to attend those meetings and learn all I could.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，我特意参加了这些会议，并尽我所能地学习。

examination_example.sentence: If you don't do this, I will take away <highlight>points</highlight> from your grade.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 如果你不这么做，我会扣你分的。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 观点; 论点; 见解
细节; 方面; 特征
点状物; 句号; 小数点
尖头; 尖端; 尖状物; 削尖

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: adj. 尖的；尖头的；锥形头的；尖锐的；不含糊的

word_family.mean: n. 尖；尖头；尖端；标点；点；处；地方；位置；条；项；分；岬角；轨尖；道岔；防守位置；接触点；尖兵队；外部位；直窜位置；束衣带；束帆绳；狗指方向的动作或姿势；重要乐句；重要主题

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 在某些点；某些时刻；在某个地方
主要观点；要点；主要切入点

sense_info_list.en: show the position or direction of something especially by extending a finger in a particular direction

examination_example.sentence: Jump high, bring the legs up, and <highlight>point</highlight> the toes forward.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 跳得高一些，把双腿抬起来，脚趾指向前方。

examination_example.sentence: Visitors <highlight>pointed</highlight> to him and screamed excitedly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 游客们指着他，兴奋地尖叫起来。

examination_example.sentence: Joe looked in the river, saw a dead fish and <highlight>pointed</highlight> at it.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 乔往河看，看到一条死鱼，就指着它。

sense_info_list.en: a particular moment in time or stage in a process

examination_example.sentence: In fact, nearly 50% of people are shy, and almost 80% feel shy at some <highlight>point</highlight> in their lives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 事实上，近50%的人是害羞的，而近80%的人在他们生命中的某个时刻感到害羞。

examination_example.sentence: To that <highlight>point</highlight> Lin had had many hobbies, but none kept his interest for more than a week or two.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 到那时，林已有过许多爱好，但没有一个爱好让他感兴趣超过一两个星期。

examination_example.sentence: Readers became a turning <highlight>point</highlight> in Dong's 21 years of hosting.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 《朗读者》成为董卿21年主持生涯的转折点。

sense_info_list.en: an argument or idea
sense_info_list.zh: 观点; 论点; 见解

examination_example.sentence: For example, when I am fighting with my dad, I'll try writing from his <highlight>point</highlight> and it works!
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，当我和我爸爸吵架时，我会尝试从他的角度来写，这很有效！

examination_example.sentence: Which of these <highlight>points</highlight> do Liz and Sam both make?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 利兹和萨姆都提出了以下哪一点？

examination_example.sentence: Decide the main <highlight>point</highlight> you want to express
examination_example.sentence_trans: 确定你想表达的要点。

examination_example.sentence: They have <highlight>pointed</highlight> out that the smell of food and drink can make other passengers unhappy.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们指出，食物和饮料的气味会让其他乘客不高兴。

examination_example.sentence: They <highlight>point</highlight> out that algae is cheap and grows very quickly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们指出藻类价格便宜，而且生长得非常快。

examination_example.sentence: A bit embarrassed, the woman smiled widely and thanked the officer for <highlight>pointing</highlight> out her misunderstanding.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 女人有点不好意思，开怀大笑，并感谢警官指出她的误解。

sense_info_list.en: a mark or unit of scoring

examination_example.sentence: Ant Forest, a feature in Alipay app, gives users <highlight>points</highlight> for doing eco-friendly things such as walking and going paperless in the office.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 蚂蚁森林，支付宝应用程序的一项功能，为参与环保如步行、无纸化办公的用户提供积分。

examination_example.sentence: Users can then use these <highlight>points</highlight> to water and grow their own virtual (虚拟的) trees.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然后，用户可以使用这些积分来浇灌和种植他们自己的虚拟树。

examination_example.sentence: A study found that first-borns have an average (平均的) IQ that is three <highlight>points</highlight> higher than people who fall into a different place in the birth order.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一项研究发现，第一个孩子的平均智商比出生顺序不同的人高三分。

sense_info_list.en: (一般作the point) the significant or essential element of what is intended or being discussed

examination_example.sentence: His speech was short, but all to the <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他的演讲很简短，但都切中要害。

examination_example.sentence: This is another important <highlight>point</highlight> about dancing.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这是关于舞蹈的另一个要点。

examination_example.sentence: Writing <highlight>Points</highlight>
examination_example.sentence_trans: 写作要点

examination_example.sentence: At its highest <highlight>point</highlight>, it is 175 meters off the ground.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它的最高点离地面175米。

examination_example.sentence: Its widest <highlight>point</highlight> is 18 miles wide．
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它最宽的地方有18英里宽。

examination_example.sentence: Most antennas work in the same way as a curved mirror focuses visible light to one <highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 大多数天线的工作原理与曲面镜将可见光聚焦到一个点一样。

sense_info_list.zh: 细节; 方面; 特征

examination_example.sentence: your weak <highlight>points</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的弱点。

examination_example.sentence: However, the bad <highlight>points</highlight> probably won't change the dreams of many teenage gamers.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，缺点可能不会改变许多青少年游戏玩家的梦想。

examination_example.sentence: To our surprise, he can always easily find humorous <highlight>points</highlight> in what seems rather usual.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 令我们惊讶的是，他总能在看似平常的事情中轻松找到幽默的地方。

sense_info_list.en: a unit of measurement for the size of letters in printing or on a computer screen, etc.

examination_example.sentence: For example, according to the requirements, the size of text in students' textbooks should be no smaller than nine-<highlight>point</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 例如，根据要求，学生课本中的文字应不小于九号。

sense_info_list.zh: 点状物; 句号; 小数点

sense_info_list.en: the tapered, sharp end of a tool, weapon, or other object
sense_info_list.zh: 尖头; 尖端; 尖状物; 削尖

word_usage.usage: point既可作及物动词，也可作不及物动词。作及物动词时，后接名词或代词作宾语；作不及物动词时，常与介词to, at, towards等连用，表示“指向某位置或方向”或“表明”。

disambiguation_list.sense_disambiguation: 泛指用某物对准某物或某人。
指把具体之物对准某个方向或某人，也可指使抽象之物有所针对。
指运动、比赛、考试、科学测验等的得分。
指学习或考试成绩，通常用字母而非数字表示。
尤指老师给学生的分数、成绩。
指比赛的最终结果，或某一门考试的得分。
主要指运动、比赛中的得分，有时也指考试的分数。
